content: Write a tale about starfish using exactly 45 words.

In the azure depths, starfish ruled. Five arms stretched, seeking wisdom from the cosmic dance above. Each arm, a conduit, absorbing celestial knowledge. They whispered secrets to the currents, guiding lost souls back to light. Their echinoderms, ancient maps, led to hidden treasures—treasures of understanding, not gold. For in their world, enlightenment was the truest wealth.
